document.heading: SERVICE ANIMALS ACCESS AMENDMENT ACT OF 2011

history.narrative: Law 19-291, the “Service Animals Access Amendment Act of 2011,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-161. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 12, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 13, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-659 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-291 became effective on Apr. 27, 2013.
